name: ASTRO-PATH
description:
It's a retro-inspired arcade classic in the making! Fly through 12 increasingly-challenging stages, dodging asteroids and comets while collecting stars in a rainbow of colors! In later stages, blast those asteroids and comets with rockets to earn even more points!

  • 12 stages of arcade-style action
  • increasing challenge as the game continues
  • bonuses that reward speed, coordination, and the skill of experienced players

This game is free to play, but if you like it, please support my work! Any donation would be greatly appreciated, and would serve as encouragement to continue making games for others to enjoy.

Made for Windows machines in Clickteam Fusion 2.5. Background music from playonloop.com .

"THANK YOU FOR PLAY!"
